title: Create FO-04 fo-experience main component
description:
Create the main fo-experience component that orchestrates the full FO-04 flow.

File to create: app/fo-04/components/fo-experience.tsx

State interface (extends FO-03):
- currentStep: number
- name, familiarity, topics (from initial screens)
- gatheringContext: GatheringContext (NEW - for dynamic screens)
- currentBatch, approvedAffirmations, etc. (from FO-03)

Flow phases:
1. Steps 0-2: Welcome (same as FO-03)
2. Step 3: Familiarity selection
3. Step 4: Topic selection
4. Steps 5+: Dynamic screens (2-5 screens via step-dynamic)
5. Swipe phase with batch generation (same as FO-03)
6. Post-swipe mockups (same as FO-03)
7. Completion screen

Key difference from FO-03: Steps 5-7 are replaced by dynamic discovery phase.

Include server action import for batch generation (copy from FO-03 actions).
acceptance_criteria: Component renders initial welcome screen and navigates through all phases
closed_reason: Created fo-experience with GatheringContext state and dynamic screen phase replacing hardcoded Steps 5-7
